name: UpdateLdapMappingForUser
description:
Update LDAP mapping for a user in GitHub Enterprise Admin.

This tool is used to update the LDAP mapping for a specific user in the GitHub Enterprise environment. It should be called when there's a need to modify or correct the LDAP information associated with a user's account.

parameters.name: github_user_handle
parameters.description: The handle for the GitHub user account to update the LDAP mapping for.

value_schema.description: The handle for the GitHub user account.

parameters.name: ldap_distinguished_name
parameters.description: The distinguished name (DN) of the LDAP entry to map to a team. It should be in a string format as specified [here](https://www.ldap.com/ldap-dns-and-rdns).

value_schema.description: The [distinguished name](https://www.ldap.com/ldap-dns-and-rdns) (DN) of the LDAP entry to map to a team.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the GitHub API.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The handle for the GitHub user account.

value_schema.description: The handle for the GitHub user account.

parameters.name: ldap_dn
parameters.description: The [distinguished name](https://www.ldap.com/ldap-dns-and-rdns) (DN) of the LDAP entry to map to a team.

value_schema.description: The [distinguished name](https://www.ldap.com/ldap-dns-and-rdns) (DN) of the LDAP entry to map to a team.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
